description: Gets information about a specified configuration for DNS query logging. For more information about DNS query logs, see CreateQueryLoggingConfig and Logging DNS Queries.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration for DNS query logging that you want to get information about.

nested_items.name: QueryLoggingConfig
nested_items.description: A complex type that contains information about the query logging configuration that you specified in a GetQueryLoggingConfig request.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID for a configuration for DNS query logging.

nested_items.name: HostedZoneId
nested_items.description: The ID of the hosted zone that CloudWatch Logs is logging queries for.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch Logs log group that Amazon Route 53 is publishing logs to.
